title: Build a Pinterest Clone App
description: A full-stack Pinterest-inspired web application where users can upload, save, and explore visual content.
details: Built using the MERN stack, the app mimics Pinterest's functionality and layout. It includes user authentication, pin creation, category filtering, and infinite scroll for a seamless experience.

title: Country Information System
description: Displays real-time information about countries using REST APIs with a dark/light mode.
details: The app fetches data from REST Countries API and provides search and filter options, accessible and mobile-friendly.

title: Landing Page for Sales/Booking
description: A landing page designed for product sales and booking services. Developed using WordPress with JavaScript enhancements for user interaction and product showcasing.
